Html:
Hi,

are you aware that the product Free Opener violates the GPL by using your component in a closed source product?

You can find it here: http://www.freeopener.com. They even admit to using it on their "source code" page, which does not provide any source code at all:

http://www.freeopener.com/source.html
No, I was not aware of this, thank you for bringing it to my attention!  I will have to look in to that.  :)
